verses.name: Luke 13:1
verses.text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galileans, whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices.

verses.name: Luke 13:2
verses.text: And Jesus answering said unto them, Suppose ye that these Galileans were sinners above all the Galileans, because they suffered such things?

verses.name: Luke 13:3
verses.text: I tell you, Nay: but, except ye repent, ye shall all likewise perish.

verses.name: Luke 13:4
verses.text: Or those eighteen, upon whom the tower in Siloam fell, and slew them, think ye that they were sinners above all men that dwelt in Jerusalem?

verses.name: Luke 13:5
verses.text: I tell you, Nay: but, except ye repent, ye shall all likewise perish.
